author: James Joyce
text: Just a scribbled line to say we got your letter. Will write tomorrow. A friend of Bertie’s rang up yesterday to say she, B. was going yesterday not to her sister but to the flat of some friend, who would nurse her as she is not yet over strong. She will ’phone us later. Rang up the dog s home. S. all right. Going to Versailles ‘un de ces jours’ Saluti a tutti B
